DESCRIPTION:
DuckTales: Remastered - it's colorful, hand-drawn remake of one of the most cherished 8-bit games of all times. Go back to the golden era of video games, but with a level of detail that will satisfy equally as the most ardent fans of the Disney cartoons, and fans of retro games from Capcom. Hand drawn animated characters voiced by the actors recognizable voices Disney, detailed policy background levels based on the classic television cartoon make Scrooge McDuck and his little family even more alive than ever. The gameplay has kept the authenticity of its 8-bit predecessor: it all as simple and entertaining, with a few changes to improve the gameplay and graphics. Immerse yourself in the real world of adventure DuckTales with Scrooge McDuck and his three nephews: Billy, Willy and Dilly on a journey to exotic places in search of the five legendary treasures.
